entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:04 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h then southwest 70 gusting to 100 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
